column2: passed away peacefully surrounded by her family on june 12
column3: 2015. born and raised in taiwan and a resident of parsippany
column4: nj. she worked with inteplast. beloved wife of haw-ran paul. devoted mother of christina paul-badini
column6: and hubert paul. loving grandmother of caius. dear sister of jiann lin
column9: mei-tsu liu and mei-ying huang. visitation at the leonardis memorial home 210 ridgedale ave. florham park on wednesday from 6-9pm. funeral on thursday assembling at the funeral home at 10am followed by a service at the funeral home at 10:30am. interment at restland memorial park in east hanover.
